name: Emoji Trip - Brain Games
description:
Tired of your routine life? It’s time to start a round the world trip by solving brain training emoji puzzles. The more emoji puzzle you solve, the more places you’ll go. Be an emoji master in Emoji Trip!

Features:
- Decrypt the mystery emojis
- Travel the World with emoji guessing game
- Use various Hints when you get stuck
- Tons of original levels
- Train your brain & logic skills
- Make various Choice in your trip
- Play offline. No internet required
- Relieve pressure, best time killer game

We are a small team and working really hard on improving Emoji Trip. If you have any advice or complain, feel free to let us know. Your advice is important to us.

Contact us:
http://bit.ly/EmojiTrip
